name: sftpgo
description: SFTPGo is a fully featured SFTP, FTP, WebDAV, and HTTP file server. It supports virtual users, storage backends, quotas, and a modern admin web UI, making it ideal for secure self-hosted file transfer.
features: Multi-protocol support: Serves files via SFTP, FTP, FTPS, WebDAV, and HTTP/S protocols.
Virtual users: Creates isolated user accounts with individual permissions and quotas.
Storage backends: Supports local filesystem, S3, Azure Blob, Google Cloud Storage, and more.
Quota management: Enforces storage limits and bandwidth restrictions per user.
Web admin UI: Manages users, folders, and settings through a modern web interface.
Public key authentication: Secures SFTP access with SSH key pairs instead of passwords.
Virtual folders: Maps multiple storage locations to a single user's directory tree.
Event hooks: Triggers custom scripts or webhooks on file uploads, downloads, or deletions.
IP filtering: Restricts access by IP address or network range for enhanced security.
Two-factor authentication: Adds TOTP-based 2FA for admin and user accounts.
REST API: Automates user and configuration management via comprehensive API.
Audit logging: Records all file operations and authentication attempts for compliance.
